title: Sign Language Recognition Prototype
description: Proof-of-concept CNN model to detect basic Peruvian sign language gestures.
impact: Early-stage prototype for real-time gesture recognition from webcam input.

title: Facial Emotion Classifier
description: Classifier trained on FER2013 with EfficientNet-B2 using PyTorch.
impact: Achieved over 65% accuracy in emotion detection across 7 classes.

title: Crypto Insights
description: ML tool to identify tokens with institutional support using CRISP-DM.
impact: Helped visualize trends in institutional crypto holdings.

title: Aviator AI Predictor
description: AI model designed to predict optimal cash-out moments in a simulated risk game.
impact: Simulated game decision support tool with predictive models for cash-out timing.

title: Andean Elite Travel Website
description: Custom tour website built entirely in Angular with dynamic routing and SEO features.
impact: Improved brand presence with responsive and SEO-ready design.

title: Infinity Luxury Travel
description: Luxury travel web app developed in Angular with a premium UI/UX and multilingual routing.
impact: Elevated the brand with a polished, high-end digital experience.

title: Travelbook Store
description: E-commerce travel product site built in Shopify with customized sections and liquid templates.
impact: Deployed full store with optimized layout, custom filtering, and integrated reservation forms.
